description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and innovation practices. yeehaa's blog posts and courses cover topics ranging from aligning misaligned systems to keeping the web weird, reflecting his diverse interests in technology, global connectivity, and sustainable design.
blurb: yeehaa: Ecosystem architect, PhD, entrepreneur, and tech innovator. Blends philosophy, coding, and education to create impactful digital landscapes. Advocates for inclusive internet and unites people around shared values.
